Introduction
This topic contains information on concepts and principles relating to hypertension, including
definitions of hypertension and isolated systolic hypertension
blood pressure readings required for SC of hypertension
﻿
confirmation with multiple blood pressure readings
pre-hypertension
predominant blood pressure in evaluations of hypertension
long term effects of hypertension
granting SC for arteriosclerotic manifestations due to hypertension
effective dates of arteriosclerotic manifestations granted secondary to hypertension
separately evaluating hypertension and heart disease
prohibition on separate evaluation of hypertension and renal dysfunction from nephritis
, and
evaluating rheumatic heart disease coexisting with hypertensive or arteriosclerotic heart disease
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5 - Cardiovascular System Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5, Section None
